QuestData.Title: The Eye of All Storms
QuestData.Description: Twilight riders circle the skies above the vortex. I fear it is their magic that has kept the cataclysmic forces from being contained by our efforts.$B$BTake to the skies with Thessera and destroy the riders and the portal from whence they came.
QuestData.LogDescription: Ride Thessera to defeat 12 Twilight Riders and destroy the Twilight Portal.
QuestData.RewardText: We are turning the tides, $n. We should be able to contain further damage.$B$BMuch work still remains to be done.
